overview: Ted Daniels (Cameron Mitchell) is a traveling rodeo hand who is attached to very little besides Gallant Bess, the wild horse that he has trained with patience and dedication. When Ted meets Penny (Audrey Long), the beautiful daughter of Doc Gray (Harry Cheshire), he falls in love with her, but circumstances force him to choose between loyalty to his steed and the chance of having a life with Penny. Can he find a way to win back Gallant Bess and get the girl?
title: The Adventures of Gallant Bess
